fibres in the outer capsule requires a little more detailed 
notice.<\s> In Fig.4.d. it is shown how this junction of 
fibres from the outer capsule with the inner capsule 
takes place. They sweep down from the <u>crossed callosal 
tract<\u> through the outer capsule, & at the <s>extreme <\s> lower 
<s>pointed <\s> extremity of the lenticular nucleus come 
out of the outer capsule & enter the inner. In this 
course they make a complete arch round the outer 
boundary line of the caudate & lenticular nuclei.
Further back the <s>cau <\s> the lower extremity of the inner 
capsule (Figs. 5 & 6.) retreats in a direction upwards 
and <s>thus <\s> this junction with the outer capsule is 
broken through.
